doc.field: This series consists of 7 linear feet and is arranged alphabetically by correspondent's last name or organization/institution. The exception to this arrangement is when Wahl designated a specific subject title for a folder. In this instance, all materials have been kept in the folder and filed under that subject rather than being individually filed. These folders generally contain miscellaneous correspondence, often related to a specific time period (e.g., "Paris, April 86"). Correspondents include Benoit d'Aboville (Consul Général), Michel Guggenheim, Stanley Hoffman, François Mitterand, Antoine de Tarlé, and Michel Debré.
